reviews.text: Overall, would stay here again if in town. Staff were nice and accommodating even though we arrived very early in te morning. Room did not really have frills, but we were not looking for extra amenities. The convenience of location and price for a clean room was what we were looking for.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: A well run property. Clean and friendly staff. Clean rooms. Bar and grill next store has surprisingly good food. On property management takes pride in this motel. And good value for the price. Curtesy van will pick you up at the truck stops or shops. Truck parking too.
reviews.title: My review

reviews.text: Firstly, I loved the bright blue walls in the rooms. I stayed 2 nights here. Some rooms are outside and some of the are indoors. I had a room inside, next to a covered breezeway. Laundry services were a little high priced, and they only had a 2 washers and 2 dryers. The pop machine downstairs in their breezeway didnt accept dollars, only quarters. The pool is enclosed by all of the outside rooms. My favorite part of staying here was the beautiful mountains that were pictured anywhere you looked. You walk out side of the front lobby and you can see a huge beautiful mountain. The hotel is conveniently located near 3-4 gas stations, the highway and the town of Hollins. It was easy to find what I needed, when I needed it. I think it is actually about 3-5 miles away from the airport, I never heard any airport traffic noise while I was there. Breakfast was comprised of items that were meant for a sweet tooth, which some do not like.. but I enjoyed. Sugary cereals, and powdered donuts for me the whole time I was there. There is also a bar/restaurant that is located on the premises. Even on a Saturday night it was not loud or noisy at all. My room was right down the hall from it. It was just an added convenience. Overall, I would stay at this hotel again. Staff was very friendly, and did not have a single problem.
reviews.title: Beautiful and Convenient!

reviews.text: I have stay here many times before and I have always good experience at this hotel. That is why I stay here. Room was nice and clean.staff is helpful and breakfast was very good, they have HBO and I love to watch that.overall it was nice stay again at this hotel. I also like location of this hotel
reviews.title: Very nice stay again,nice hotel and staff
"Jatin Patel" Kindness and professionalism {general manager}
reviews.text: Mr Patel of Days Inn@ airport was unmatched. Exmaple the air went out in the room where I
was to have a book signing and Mr Jatin Patel searched the Hotel for Fans for our Comfort.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is somewhat dated but in a convenient location to the highway. Our room was clean but somewhat worn. The beds were very comfortable but noise from other guests was an issue. The sink is separate from the bath tub and toilet which helped when trying to get going in the morning. The shower nozzel is set at about 5 ft high, so I had to bend down to wash my hair. Breakfast was okay - they were a little overwhelmed with the crowd from a bus, but recovered quickly after the crowd left. We would consider staying here again when visiting the area.
reviews.title: Good value and convenient

reviews.text: My friend and I stayed here this past weekend and we very much enjoyed our stay here. The room was spacious and clean. The beds were comfortable. It was close to the interstate. The front desk staff was very friendly. We very much enjoyed the continental breakfast. The food was good and an attendant made sure it was well stocked and the area was kept clean. I would highly recommend this hotel and we are already planning on returning and staying here again next year for our conference.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here on the way to Georgia, Staff were all very friendly and room was very clean. Convienient to highway,but not noisy. Thought it was a bit pricey compared to days inns a little farther down the highway, but still one of the better bargains in the Roanoke area
reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
